snippet.title: Forest Knight  Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Download Forest Knight Early Access for FREE:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ChronoGames.Forest.Knight


The Evil is growing stronger every day... and this time, the knight is overwhelmed. The Skeleton Lord leading this gloomy fortress repelled him in a ruined tower, and now he can feel the emptiness behind him as his sword tries to keep away these awful undead creatures... But too late! Faster than a snake, the Skeleton Lord swoops on him, throwing him in the cold air of the night. This time, he is lost... wait, these runes floating here, a portal! Snatched by the magical entity, body and soul are torn then merged in a fraction of second, in a dazzling light... And finally, he lands, in a very different landscape... Surrounded by gigantic trees, in a quiet clearing of the deep forest. The fight is not ending today...
